publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4108 Aileen Campbell: Congratulations to Sean Allan, Winner of the Lockerbie Trophy at the Robert Burns World Federation Schools Competition—That the Parliament congratulates Sean Allan, from primary five in Crawforddyke Primary School, Carluke, on winning the Lockerbie Trophy at the Robert Burns World Federation Schools Competition on 8 May 2009; notes that Sean won the trophy for his performance of a Burns medley on the fiddle and that he is the first competitor from Lanarkshire to win the prize; believes that this is a particularly impressive success during the Year of Homecoming, and wishes all competitors and winners the very best of luck in future competitions organised by the Robert Burns World Federation.

S3M-4108 Congratulations to Sean Allan, Winner of the Lockerbie Trophy at the Robert Burns World Federation Schools Competition (lodged on 11 May 2009) Alasdair Allan*, Jamie Hepburn*, Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*, Kenneth Gibson*, Rob Gibson*, Nigel Don*, Christine Grahame*, Stuart McMillan*, David Stewart*
S3M-4108 Congratulations to Sean Allan, Winner of the Lockerbie Trophy at the Robert Burns World Federation Schools Competition (lodged on 11 May 2009) Brian Adam*

S3M-4108 Aileen Campbell: Congratulations to Sean Allan, Winner of the Lockerbie Trophy at the Robert Burns World Federation Schools Competition—That the Parliament congratulates Sean Allan, from primary five in Crawforddyke Primary School, Carluke, on winning the Lockerbie Trophy at the Robert Burns World Federation Schools Competition on 8 May 2009; notes that Sean won the trophy for his performance of a Burns medley on the fiddle and that he is the first competitor from Lanarkshire to win the prize; believes that this is a particularly impressive success during the Year of Homecoming, and wishes all competitors and winners the very best of luck in future competitions organised by the Robert Burns World Federation. Supported by: Alasdair Allan, Jamie Hepburn, Bob Doris, Bill Kidd, Kenneth Gibson, Rob Gibson, Nigel Don, Christine Grahame, Stuart McMillan, David Stewart, Brian Adam
S3M-4108 Congratulations to Sean Allan, Winner of the Lockerbie Trophy at the Robert Burns World Federation Schools Competition (lodged on 11 May 2009) Gil Paterson*
